#summary Using Jabref p2p to collaborate with others on Jabref
#labels Featured

=Requirement=
  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/jabref/files/jabref/2.5/ Jabref 2.5],
  * Both friends need to have the plugin installed to see each other

=Getting Started=
  1) Installation
Run Jabref 2.5 and follow the 3 steps to install the plugin
  a) *Plugins > Manage Plugins*
<br/><img src="http://jabrefpp.googlecode.com/files/managePlugin.png" width="700">

  b) *Download Plugin*
From the bottom options, choose "Download plugin", and enter <br/>http://jabrefpp.googlecode.com/files/com.google.code.jabrefpp-1.0.jar
<br/><img src="http://jabrefpp.googlecode.com/files/downloadPlugin.png">

  c) *Restart Jabref*
Shutdown and reopen your Jabref and the plugin "Jabref p2p" should be in your plugin tab now.
<br/><img src="http://jabrefpp.googlecode.com/files/installSuccess.png">


  2) Usage
  a) Run the plugin with, *Plugins > Jabref p2p*
<br/><img src="http://jabrefpp.googlecode.com/files/runPlugin.png" width="700">
  b) *Enter a name*
Just enter a name your friends will recognize. After entering your name, there is a built-in user guide to help you with the various functions to using Jabref p2p.
<br/><img src="http://jabrefpp.googlecode.com/files/enterName.png">
